file.name: open-api.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: '1.0.0'
  title: Demo
  description: Demo OAS Spec
paths:
  /demo:
    post:
      summary: Demo
      description: Demo
      tags:
        - Demo
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/request'
components:
  schemas:
    error:
      allOf:
      - required:
        - demoErr1
        properties:
          demoErr1:
            type: string
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/response'
    response:
      type: object
      required:
        - demoRes1
        - demoRes2
      properties:
        demoRes1:
          description: Demo
          type: string
          enum:
            - A
            - B
            - C
        demoRes2:
          description: Demo
          type: string
    optional:
      allOf:
        - properties:
            aProperty:
              type: string
    request:
      type: object
      properties:
        foo:
          type: string
    referenced:
      allOf:
      - required:
        - demoErr1
        properties:
          demoErr1:
            type: string
      - $ref: 'open-api-ref.yml#/components/schemas/referenced'
